```
$ echo '#!/bin/bash' >> hello.sh
$ echo 'echo "hello world"' >> hello.sh
$ chmod +x ./hello.sh
$ ./hello.sh
hello world
```

```
$ true
$ echo $?
0
$ false
$ echo $?
1
```

```
$ touch /etc/my_file
touch: cannot touch '/etc/my_file': Permission denied
$ echo $?
1
```

```
$ touch /etc/my_file || echo "Fail!"
touch: cannot touch '/etc/my_file': Permission denied
Fail!
$ touch /tmp/my_file && echo "Success!"
Success!
```

```
    |                         ^
$ ./sigill
Floating point exception (core dumped)
$ echo $?
136
```
